name: Pets Unite
description:
You have a lot of pets and they are all over the place. Use your treats to get all your pets to "join together" in the center for an emergency pet meeting. Some pets only like certain treats too.

Controls:

Arrow Keys or WASD to move

Left Click to place treat

Right Click to pickup (delete) treat

Note: WebGL version may have some problems, I recommend using the Windows version.

Another Note: This game is may contain some bugs and is missing a few features. However, this game is still really playable and can be fun.

Please comment and share what you think!
